import { Container, Heading, Center, HStack, Text, Box, Image, VStack, Avatar, Icon } from "@chakra-ui/react"; import { FaFacebook, FaInstagram, FaTwitter } from "react-icons/fa"; import {TbMinusVertical} from 'react-icons/tb' const BlogPost = () => { return ( <> Full Guide to Becoming a Professional Chef
John Smith 15 march 2022
We have created a list of easy sandwich recipes you can make for breakfast. But the highlight of these recipes is that
they come with a desi twist ); }; export default BlogPost;
